segments.text: Excuse me , is there a Post Office around here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . There's one on the corner of 23th street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do I get there from here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just walk north for 3 blocks . It's next to the Mexico restaurant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , very close . Maybe 5 minutes walk .
segments.speaker: S2
